name: Record Scratch Fever
description:
It's your first gig as an acid-jazz kitty jam band. Will you stun the crowd and win a sweet fish payout or will you absolutely flounder?

Controls:

Up Arrow/W : Hit note on the up bar

Down Arrow/S : Hit note on the down bar

Enter : Continue

The Team:

lapspider45 : Coding, Music

jpeg2k : Art, Music, SFX

if the game lags/desyncs, try downloading it or using a different browser.
